categories.name: Dairy
categories.description: This department has all of your Dairy needs to include Milks, Cheeses, Creamers, Yogurts, and More

categories.name: Produce
categories.description: This department has all of your Produce needs to include Fresh Fruits, Fresh Vegetables, Whole Nuts, Packaged Vegetables, Organic Fruits and Vegetables, and More

categories.name: Meat
categories.description: The meat department has butchered and packaged meat products to include Beef, Pork, Chicken, Seafood, and a variety of exotic meats.

categories.name: Floral
categories.description: The floral department has a wide variety of flowers, succulents, cacti, and plants available for any special occasion.

products.name: Bananas
products.description: Fresh ripe bananas, organic also available

products.name: Milk
products.description: Milk, available in Whole, 2%, 1%, Fat-Free, Organic, and Lactose-Free.

products.name: Roses
products.description: A wide variety of roses. Different colors, and colors. Available as plants, fresh cut, or in arrangements, also available is special orders.
